name: com.romifauzi.amplifyocclusion
description: Amplify Occlusion was the first industry-grade, full-featured screen-space ambient occlusion solution to be released on the Asset Store in 2016, at a time when Unity itself lacked a decent SSAO implementation. It managed to remain the fastest SSAO solution for Unity released a built-in implementation of "Multi-scale Volumetric Occlusion" as part of their Post-processing Stack.
